AI Description: NetCDF-COMBINED is a package that combines multiple NetCDF files together to create a single output file. It is specifically designed for manipulating large datasets stored in the NetCDF format.
Core Features: Combines Multiple Netcdf Files Into A Single Output File, Supports Large Datasets, Facilitates Data Manipulation & Organization, Compatible With Netcdf Format
General Tags: Data Manipulation, Netcdf Files, Large Datasets, File Organization
